/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red and white facades standing out against the blue sky. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The trees lining the street provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the concrete structures. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the scene.
